component.name: nijiexpose-nightly
component.summary: Tool to create and edit nijilive puppets.

description.p: nijilive is a framework for realtime 2D puppet animation which can be used for VTubing, game development and digital animation.
nijiexpose is a tool that lets you use nijilive puppets as tracked avatars.
This is a nightly build of nijiexpose!
nijiexpose may crash unexpectedly and you will likely encounter bugs.
Make sure to save and back up your work often!
